projectGridLines.title: Project details given in Desription
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Market Research / Company Research


Description: Process of gathering, analyzing and interpreting information about a market/company, including information about the target audience, competitors, industry multiples and overall industry trendsSkill sets: Analytical mindset, Report Writing, Problem-Solving Skills, Business acumen, versatility


Skill sets: 

Traits expectation: 

Expected learning: Market trends / opportunities, understand the competitive landscape, discover unexplored areas to expand product capabilities in


Specific courses required for project execution:  Background in eCom, finance would be helpful but not a prerequisite 


Title: M&A Deals


Description: Evaluation, and execution of mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and other strategic transactions including fund raising Skill sets: Project management, Managing stakeholders, Financial Analysis and Valuation Skills,  Strategic thinking and Insights, Negotiation / Communication skills, Understanding/Interpreting company financial reports, excel and ppt proficiency


Skill sets:

Traits expectation: 

Expected learning: Detailed understanding of Pixis capabilities to help identify targets which would complement the current offerings of Pixis AI tool 


Specific courses required for project execution: Background in eCom, finance would be helpful but not a prerequisite 


Title: Preparing Management / Stakeholder decks


Description: Prepare presentations and reports for senior management and the board of directors to support strategic decision-making; maintain regular tracking of acquired entities/financial metrics/operational performances tracking


Skill sets: Analytical mindset, Report Writing, Problem-Solving Skills, Business acumen, versatility, benchmarking skills, Excel and PPT proficiency


Traits expectation: 

Expected learning:Enhancement of technical, analytical, and interpersonal skills; insights into how inorganic growth is tracked 


Specific courses required for project execution:  Background in eCom, finance would be helpful but not a prerequisite
